com.karusmc.xmc.xml

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.karusmc.xmc.xml.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends Object
    Acts as a parser for XML documents.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Parser(Node node, String dtd, String path)
      Constructs this with the specified the base node, DTD name and DTD file location.
      Parser(Node node, XMLResolver resolver)
      Constructs this with the specified the base node and XMLResolver.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void parse(File file)
      Registers commands to the base node and parses the XML document.
      void register(XMCommand command)
      Registers the specified command to be parsed.
      void registerAll(Map<String,XMCommand> commands)
      Registers a map of commands to be parsed.
      void unregister(String name)
      Unregisters a command with the name specified.
      void unregisterAll()
      Unregisters all commands.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Parser

        public Parser(Node node,
              String dtd,
              String path)
        Constructs this with the specified the base node, DTD name and DTD file location. ParserException will be thrown if the DTD in the XML document differs from the DTD specified when invoking parse(File file).
        Parameters:
        node - the base node used when parsing a XML document
        dtd - the DTD name
        path - the DTD file path

      • Parser

        public Parser(Node node,
              XMLResolver resolver)
        Constructs this with the specified the base node and XMLResolver.
        Parameters:
        node - the base node used when parsing a XML document
        resolver - the XMLResolver used to validate and resolve the DTD file

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public void parse(File file)
        Registers commands to the base node and parses the XML document.
        Parameters:
        file - the XML document to be parsed

      • register

        public void register(XMCommand command)
        Registers the specified command to be parsed.
        Parameters:
        command - a command to be parsed.

      • unregister

        public void unregister(String name)
        Unregisters a command with the name specified.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the command to be unregistered.

      • registerAll

        public void registerAll(Map<String,XMCommand> commands)
        Registers a map of commands to be parsed.
        Parameters:
        commands - a map of commands to be parsed

      • unregisterAll

        public void unregisterAll()
        Unregisters all commands.
